reviews.review_text: Debbie D, is so nice and professional! She is always ready to help any customers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chris, thanks for the 5-star review! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: As always I had success finding what I needed at my local Canadian Tire.  I was able to locate the item via the website and then had a staff member unlock the caged area where the item was stocked.  He was helpful, ensuring that I had the correct item number.  The bonus was that the item was even on sale!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars review, Deanna! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the service and the selection of items. We are looking forward to seeing you again! The Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great store with great outdoor and seasonal products
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your positive feedback! Were glad that you enjoy our store and we cant wait to have you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tire in Park and Telford is my favourite location, the store is big, clean and bright. It s very beautiful during the Christmas time. The photos taken are from the Black Friday, it was busy but not too busy.

Year after year after year after year we continue to receive outstanding service from the Auto department!  We are always impressed by the work, customer attention, and knowledge.  Ive never had a complaint and intend to continue using them in the future.  Cheers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great auto service experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: my interaction with kamand  was outstanding. Their exceptional communication skills, product expertise, and willingness to assist left a lasting positive impression. I commend their commitment to excellence and would highly recommend their service to others.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Brenda! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Kamand. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of interacting with one of your customer service representatives kamand , and I must say it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I reached out for assistance, their professionalism and helpfulness were evident.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ali, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Kamand. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: we love to go to Canadian Tire for seasonal products, this visit was for our Halloween Decorations. we find the best options for our themes. and reasonable priced.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Heather! Were happy you were able to find what you needed in our store! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Best experience with Sebastian in the mechanic department - I came in because one of my windshield wipers were broken and he walked me through the whole process! Super helpful, kind and generous with his attention. Would highly recommend going to see him! Canadian Tire, great employee
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Danielle! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Sebastian. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Initially I had problems ordering a red tea whistling tea kettle online at the Canadian Tire Website, and then phoned the Main Street store in North Vancouver to arrange for pick up, because there were only 2 kettles left on the shelf.  I spoke with Hammad, and he was so helpful and very polite, explaining all he was going to do; then put me on hold momentarily to locate the kettle.  When he returned, he informed me that he did put the kettle on hold, and I went that same evening to pick it up.  I was so grateful for all of his help, and Hammad has proven to be such a good Customer Service Associate.  Thank you Hammad!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Meg, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Hammad. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I often drifted in to buy parts and tools for my old pickup and liked the friendly service that you never get at Lordco or Bumper to Bumper. This year I got the Canadian Tire VIP card which was a fantastic deal. I feel bad when the survey asked if anyone made my visit special because I don t need anyone now. I walk through the doors, pull up my C.T. App and search for what I am looking for. Batteries (Isle 13), electrical Isle 56. And, more importantly they are right where the app says and always in stock. Take note Rona get organized or you will be out of business soon as you are hopeless at stock control and customer service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We love hearing from great customers like you! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: This store has most of the things that you are looking for.    nice manager. One of the manager is so nice and helpful. I don t know her name. She is in early 60s ( I guess) she is so nice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: This place has everything you need for Summer activities and some! From gardening to camping, I buy all my gear/equipment from this store - what a wonderful selection they have. The Christmas lights are always in stock at this location too. Amazing stuff CT!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Paul, thanks for the 5-star review! Were happy were able to provide you with a great selection of items. We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I don t usually write review but I got couple of huge things from seasonal department, Seasonal guy (Ali) helped me to find it and after purchasing he helped me to put those heavy products in my car, also he organized my trunk to not coming back again to pickup my stuff. If you want something from seasonal section he s the guy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars! See you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome store can get all you house products and furnishing. repair your own things.

reviews.review_text: The North Van store is clean, well stocked and has the best staff!  They are always helpful and smiling.   Totally exceeded my expectations.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your review, David! Were happy to hear that youre satisfied with our store. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great service at Northshore location. This place saved me a big trip for the mess other place in Vancouver left for me. Thank you !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars! Were happy to hear you enjoyed the service and we look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Always friendly staff and keep your eyes open for great discounts during the year

reviews.review_text: A large quantity of the product I was looking for and a great price! Friendly and helpful staff too.

reviews.review_text: Great spacey ,fresh smelling place,everything under one roof.Prices are so great for high quality merchandise.If there was no Canadian Tire someone would have to invent.Already planning for my next visit..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Good easy access.  Product was in stock and they price matched the product.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, John! We hope to see you again very soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Have a large selection of products in every department. Parking is normally easy to find but at busy times can sometimes be difficult.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Luc, thanks for the 5-star rating! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Special thanks to Mike Wallace in the Auto department in North Vancouver.He is super helpful, kind, detail oriented and he goes above and beyond .He notifies me that my transmission is leaking he explained how it will costly and dangerous if it did not fix. Also thanks to Anlen to find the right tire.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Best canadian tire ive been to. Seems to have a larger selection, better organization and just cleaner. The clearance section is a huge benefit to this location

reviews.review_text: Great store, helpful staff. Great selection and very fair pricing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your positive feedback! Were glad that you enjoy our store and we cant wait to have you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Well managed CT. They have everything in stock even with the troubles in the supply chain! Keep up the good work. Floor staff are also equality Good at keeping a tidy store and making sure aisles are tidy. The team here deserves recognition for their hard work and dedication!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive review, D S!   Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: They always have a great variety of sporting goods, not to mention many other useful household items.
Service helped me out in an urgent situation. Many thanks to them for fitting me in and taking care of me so I could complete my drive home to Calgary on the long weekend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lilac, thank you for the 5-star review. We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great range of products and staff are usually there to help and provide a good customer experience

reviews.review_text: The best Canadian Tire Ive ever been to. The employees are all super helpful.

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tire in North Van always has what I need, the store is clean and organized, and the staff are friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your review, Nancy! Were happy that we were able to provide you with everything that you needed. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I recently visited the auto service center at the North Vancouver Main St location. I needed new brakes on my car and Cody gave me a reasonable quote on the work and set me up with a appointment. From there Andrew took care of me during the service. Both gentlemen were super friendly and I would not hesitate to take my car to them again. Thanks Andrew and Cody!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi C, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: My friendly neighborhood Canadian Tire store. Thanks for keeping the shelves stocked and the store much like normal times. Was really impressed by the quantity of hand sanitizer available. Good variety and a good place to buy tools and material items for automobiles, home projects and such.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your review, John! Were happy to provide you with everything that you need. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: The Auto Service team was friendly and efficient. Theyre open late on weekdays which worked out perfectly for us. Highly recommend bringing your vehicle here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, we appreciate the 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Checked on line for an item I need. This store said it had  4. They have none on shelves. Will take up to 7 days to order. I need it today. Manager went out of her way to find one hidden away in storage. Leaving as a happy customer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sandra, thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are pleased to hear you ended up having a great experience! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Purchased a dining set today! The manager was super nice and helpful, Thank you Debbie
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: A very excellent , easy access to public transit, very professional and trained staff, very kind and professional manager

reviews.review_text: Great experiences only at this store, so far, except for calling. They don t answer the phones even when the store isn t super busy. The staff in-store are super friendly and helpful. Stock isn t always the best, but every store has struggled with stocking items during the pandemic. I wish that they had a better indoor plant selection and outdoor seasonal garden centre. There is a huge opportunity for this location, as competitors nearby don t have great stock or service. If I need a plant, I ll usually drive to Bentall, which has an amazing selection, but it s much further away.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the positive review! We are glad to see that we were able to provide you with great customer service. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Like most Canadian Tire stores, this one was clean, and well organized, with friendly, knowledgeable, and professional staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, we appreciate the 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again. Corporate Customer Experience Team

Had to return an item, service was quick and friendly

reviews.review_text: John and Niko in the automotive department are amazing! They took such great care of me and my car, I recommend this location!

reviews.review_text: Always helpful and good advice for all your car needs

reviews.review_text: Shout out to Service Writer Cody and the technicians who helped me out of a bad spot this afternoon. Even though the shop was busy they managed to get my car in ASAP to fix a problem with my E39 BMW. Again, thanks guys!  James Alexander --Deep Cove
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review. We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great staff, easy to talk to! Deb and Liz is super helpful!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review! Were glad to hear you had a great experience and we hope to see you again soon. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Just had a new set of tires installed. The set that the website said were compatible with my vehicle were not. The staff at Canadian Tire caught this, corrected the error, and helped me choose appropriate tires, with no up-sell and friendly, genuine service. Great, attentive staff !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ben, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great auto service experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff and good deals

Thank you Canadian tire for helping us get our vehicle inspected for importation! Arvin was very pleasant to work with and took the time to help us with the following steps! Also, during our wait, we shopped around and found most of everything we needed to complete our apartment.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great auto service experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I had a great experience shopping at this Canadian Tire. Sepideh in customer service put all her effort to help me in my needs . She was very friendly and willing to help .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sherry, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Got some automotive service here they didn t try and sell me on stuff I didn t need. Staff was great to work with and incredibly kind. Will come back here again for sure. Also the staff inside the sale department of the regular store were also fantastic!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great auto service experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Excellent Store Great Staff and Prices
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Percy, thank you for the positive review! We are glad to see that we were able to provide you with great customer service. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Hi there. I was in the North Vancouver store today and I was amazed at the service and attention to my needs. All the staff was very helpful and kind.  I believe the manager I dealt with s name was Debbie?  Very patient and helpful. I witnessed an interaction with a very rude and condescending customer that made one of the cashiers very upset. The same manager I dealt with earlier  interceded with this person and I am shocked at how some customers treat people. I just want to say I respect and appreciate everything your staff do and go through.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Luie, we appreciate the 5-star rating and look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Love this place. Always has what I m looking for.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Adam, thank you for the 5-star review. We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I needed a mattress until I get my new one delivered and decided I would get an air mattress.  I spoke to a Sales Rep (think the name was Essie?) and they only had a couple left but he gave me a perfect description and put 2 aside for me to look at.  I was so pleased at the products and bought one..  Last night I had a better sleep on that air mattress then the hugely expensive one I bought (and have just returned back to) Sleep Country.  It also feels very good in Canadian Tire = so much product and so well displayed - THANKS
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: The service I received today in your North Vancouver was exceptional. It took just a few minutes to get my problem solved by Narges. What she did shows her deep understanding of the concept of customer service. Although I was thinking my issue is fair and real, however it was absolutely up to her to accept it or let me down. Narges listened to me with compassion and tried to get my problem solved quickly.I believe Canadian Tire has passed its values to the staffs and the guidelines helped both Narges and Mahboobeh to offer the best service. Very impressed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Narges. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Always great service, professional and friendly staff, excellent products highly recommended
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, we really appreciate the 5 stars! See you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Any time I come here, staff are so knowledgeable about the product and store layout. Ill ask for the most obscure product and theyll know the aisle number and location instantly. Great selection too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kaylynn, thanks for the 5 stars and for your visit! Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome place to work at! Shopping is fantastic here! A lot of selection and most staff are knowledgeable! Christmas can get hectic, but thats everywhere. Awesome deals and very good prices. Clean aisles and friendly staff and managers. Drinks and snacks inside checkout aisles and lots of restaurants nearby for snacks or coffee if you want before shopping!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi! Thanks for the 5 stars and for your visit! Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Brought my car here with a blown tire. Thank you Ahmed for finding the tire and installing it with the sense urgency!

reviews.review_text: Great service... Guiding and supporting the customer. Ray and Cody from the Auto department were very dedicated to support me finding a solution to a car part I needed. Well done!

reviews.review_text: Super helpful and patient staff at the Outdoor area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Justin! See you soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Has all cleaning supplies I need as m a self employed cleaner, only wish wed get some type of discount only proving we are cleaners of course, so life would be easier for me and affordable as I need these supplies for my clients

reviews.review_text: Canadian tire has always been my go to place. It has everything I need my gardening my tools..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Ginger! We love hearing from great customers like you and we hope to see you again very soon. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great experience and plenty of courteous help!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thanks for the 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you again. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Went shopping for an item for Christmas...the item was not on display, but it said on line that it was carried at the store.... we asked a staff member for help and looking in computer it was stored in the back.  The staff could not find the item and rather than telling us it was out of stock,(cause the computer said otherwise) they kept looking & looking... I think we had 2 managers, 3 stock persons, and 2 others all helping us. We felt so special! The hard work paid off after about 30 min wait.... our item was hidden behind some other boxes in the stock room.   We left happy with 2 guys helping us to our car.  Kudos to the staff. A+

As a child I spent many an afternoon exploring the intricate maze that this wonderful establishment provides. Hours of entertainment hiding from my curmudgeon of a father who would chase me down with his wicker back scratcher howling with laughter!   such was childhood before all the wokes and brokes decided to ban fun!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Adrian, we appreciate the 5-star review! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: This location is the only one asides the Coquitlam store that I can actually find what I need   I could spend most of the day browsing through all the different items. That a lot of stores don t carry. I got a new car battery and automotive service was excellent! Parking is okay and depending upon the time and day, the store can get pretty busy. Definitely satisfied with my experiences thus far.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Alex! Were happy you re able to find everything you re looking for in our store! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Not too big and not too small. Just right.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daryl, were glad to see you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: This can tire is one of the biggist stores in the lower mainland (and belive me cause Ive been to most here in the lower mainland )in the past few years corporate has done there home work its a one stop shop for most things a person could ever want  in anything thar has to do with the great out doors ANYTHING ITS all there if you need house hold things from cleaning products to out fitting  your kitchen with any thing youll ever need .With there hardware department youll find it all there .Now from there tool department you wont have the need to go any were else to buy any of the  tools your in need of. cause its all there every tool known to man kind then Young want to paint your place yap ! you name it they got it .Now for your ride ! Im not even going to go into explaning what they have for your ride! And that is EVERY THING YOUD ever want telling you other than this ,the best place in that category for you automobile needs now for the other things that you need for your home ,tools..,garden, car ,out door activates even food this is the one stop shop and very competitive pricing so dont hesitate to head to this store but bring lots of $ cause if you dont go in with a list of what your needing and just walk around youll fill a cart up I found if I grab a basket Im not tempted but if I grab there over sized cart well............ OK take care now
no need to describe. all is good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars! We hope to see you again very soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: It is my favorite place to buy tools, it has really good warranty on tools which compatative to famous brands. Also, they are carry personal which helped me all the time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thanks for the 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you again. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Please pass along my thanks to your amazing team. This evening I went to this location looking for several items, including a large ladder twice my size, with very limited time. Firstly, the website is amazing and helpful - it says locations where items are available, the quantity, and even the aisle. That is seriously awesome for somebody like myself that loves to do research but prefers to shop in-store. Secondly, every staff member I spoke to and asked for help answered my questions, directed me to where I needed to go, and offered to help carry my things aisle to aisle then to the cash register then to my car. I am blown away. I cannot thank you all enough.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review 5 stars, Guislen! We are happy to hear that you have had an excellent experience and hope to see you again soon. The Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tire almost always had what Im looking for. Theres some great deals all the time and the product quality has usually made me happy. Their website is easy to use with a pretty good search function, and the prices and in-store quantities match. Ive only tried order pick up once, just after Boxing Day, so it was a little messy. That was due to the huge amount of orders and I was rushing to get my item, so it was understandable. All in all, a good place to shop.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the positive review, Michael! Were happy to hear that you had a great experience. See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great store great people except the red bull cooler wasnt cold
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jesse, we appreciate the 5-star review! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I m normally never impressed by dealing with retail but today was wonderful. The young woman this morning who exchanged my Soda stream cartridge was so helpful. Also, a young man named James made my battery exchange so easy and he was very knowledgeable. A good day at the North Vancouver Canadian Tire. Crazy
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were glad to hear you had a great experience at our store, Peter. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Lots of choice, unique household goods and good specials...friendly staff....was also able to quickly and  easily pickup after ordering online....only one washroom-difficult to access
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 stars! Come back soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I always love to shopping at Canadian tires
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Ruth. We love hearing from great customers like you! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Love the place always can find what I need here and they have great customer service but I do find if unhave a little bit of knowledge in what u need it dose make it easier to find so yah check this out
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Luigi, we appreciate the 5-star review! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: So disappointed to be followed and rudely spoken to at this location. Absolutely gutted to be called suspicious for no reason. Long time shopper until today. Update: Thanks for reaching out Bruce. Honestly the one hiccup aside your store is my go to for many things. 1 star changed to 5.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Laura, thank you for sharing your review with us. We d like to learn more about your experience. Can you please call us at 1-800-387-8803? Thank you. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: My girlfriend and I needed a few things for our new apartment. Randy the manager was fantastic- helpful, friendly, efficient. Aly was helping as well and was also excellent. Both of these guys are a credit to Canadian Tire!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Randy. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I wanted to share my experience with a woman who works at the Returns and Exchanges desk, I think her name is Narges. Over the past year I have had the pleasure of dealing with her twice, and also, while waiting in line, I have seen her interact with other customers. Her customer service is truly exceptional. She goes above and beyond to be helpful, does way more for the customer than would ever be required. Canadian Tire is very fortunate to have someone like this on their staff! Thank you Narges!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Susan, Were happy to hear you enjoyed the service. We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Service was very good. I return one item to exchange to the different model just a few minute item was exchange
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your review, Jose! Were happy to hear that youre satisfied with our store. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tyre usually always has what I need Good prices to quality you get what you pay for got a 3 ton trolly jack and its been awesome so far good customer service the people there in my experience have been very helpful
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Dean! We appreciate the 5-star review! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Some people there is no pleasing them judging from the reviews. I have always had good service, and if I have had to return an item, I have not had an issue at all. Perhaps the goods that I have returned are in the same condition as when I purchased them, and the packaging has been taken care of and not torn, and I keep all my receipts. If I have used a product, and it fails or I do not like it, I take it back straight away, completely in tact with all the bits and pieces. There is a reason why some items cannot be returned, and people have to respect and understand why.

You might think....this guy gives every place 5 stars....well than I can tell you that, where I can shop with my hands in my pockets..whistling a tune while checking out sales and good quality items without getting bothered by sales people I feel comfy, and they sell almost everything! This is where I heard the word Raincheque for the first time  , before that all I ever heard was  No- sold out.  .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karl, Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to having you back! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Frank is an honest and straightforward description of a hot dog. I found a bouquet of metal rods with handles to cook Franks from a meter away. They dont sell actual hot dogs here however. My family gets embarrassed if I look for ants on the floor while on my hands and knees, so I have to do ant checks while walking upright. From that walking height, the store appeared almost antless.

I am a lifelong Canadian Tire customer and fan.  I rarely have a disappointing experience in any of the stores across our great country.  This location is heads and shoulders above any other store I have visited in terms of stock, cleanliness, and staff.  I have been extremely happy dealing with them for years for all their services including their auto service (typically this is where even the best Canadian Tire stores fall short but I have had excellent service on many vehicles including more complex custom jobs).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Matt! Were glad to hear you had a great experience and we hope to see you again soon. Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Excellent job! David Wong and his team are the best, I come to auto services in here for 10 years always happy, Thank you David for all your help and make all customers happy here
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Friendly and professional staff. I went there to return an antenna, the return policy was perfect and the lady was well experienced. Then I asked Babak about a chair availability, and he helped us to find everything we needed with patience, and Iman helped us to load all the stuff in the car.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hooman, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We pride ourselves on our customer service and we re thrilled to hear you had a great experience. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian Tire auto repair is the best.  David, manager of the unit, looks after me with great care, courtesy and honesty.  My 2002 Ford Focus has been well maintained by the team which, as an octogenarian driver, I appreciate greatly. Many thanks. Phyllis Mary Bell
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5-star review! We look forward to your next visit! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Very helpful staff at the North Vancouver location. I had two young gentleman help me find oil and an oil filter for my tractor. Gents were more then helpful and went the extra mile to find the items with the correct specs to my tractor. Service like this should not go unrecognized. Great experience and my bill came to under $35 for everything and saved me hundreds if I were to have my tractor professionally serviced.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Sukhdeep! Were glad to hear you enjoyed the service from our team. We hope to see you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Great physical distancing practices put in place. Also great hand sanitation implemented. Fast service and really happy to be able to get the products our family needed. Service is always great, employees friendly and helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Close by convience thats got so many products for reasonable prices.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Patrick! Were happy you were able to find what you needed in our store! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: Canadian tire has a nice selection of products and an amazing return policy. I dont feel locked into any purchase I make their so I tend to buy a lot of stuff from Canadian tire. The shop at Canadian Tire is very great and they have a excellent team of proficient mechanics.  I always bring my car here if it needs some fluid changed or a quick repair.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 4-star review, Matthew. Hopefully, we can make your next visit a 5-star one! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I moved to Vancouver recently and needed to have all my cars inspected before I can register them in BC. I was referred to Canadian Tire (North Vancouver) by my friends with a glowing recommendation. David has been exceptional to work with at Canadian Tire. He was not only empathetic and attentive with my needs and concerns, but he was also very generous with his time making sure I understand the condition of my cars. Canadian Tire is very fortunate to have David and his team at the Auto Service department.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nelson, thank you for the 5-star review! See you again soon! Corporate Customer Experience Team

reviews.review_text: I like this location, staff are helpful and friendly. Usually well stocked with most things Ive gone in for as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Taran! Were happy we were able to go above and beyond for you. Thank you! Corporate Customer Experience Team
